showBattery.title: Show Battery Percentage
showBattery.description: experimental: Show the 'batteryPercentageRemaining' attribute as a property. Note that this attribute is reported from a power constrained device with possibly low quality consumer-grade batteries. Therefore, it may not represent what you expect. Particularly, it may drop in large increments and may suddenly go from, say, 50% to 1%. This attribute is reported very infrequently, maybe as little as once a day, so may take a while to appear after being enabled.
